contact.title: Book your journey or contact us

card.contactSubtitle: If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us via the form below.
card.bookSubtitle: If you would like to book a journey, please fill out the form below.

labels.dateHint:
You have to select the first saturday of your journey, it will automatically select a period of 7 days.
For any other request, please contact us via the contact form.
labels.attendeesSubtitle: Please provide the full name of each attendee
